name: Notion Bookshelf
description: Notion Bookshelf is #1 across the best book tracking template you can find for Notion. The book tracker is a minimalist design and includes a database of books, a wish list, notes, a database of authors, genres, and a reading goal.Do you ever feel like you can't read the books you want?You have too many things to do and not enough time to read books.You want to read a book but don't know which one.You find reading simply too tricky.You always forget what you have read.You have a lack of motivati
features: You want to read a book but don't know which one.; You find reading simply too tricky.; You always forget what you have read.; You have a lack of motivation to read books.
